org.rcsb.mbt.model.util
Class ChemicalComponentBonds

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.util.ChemicalComponentBonds

public class ChemicalComponentBonds
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a dictionary of chemical component bonds enabling the intelligent detection, creation, and culling of bonds for known molecules. WARNING: If you change the package name, you MUST change the fully qualified classname string in the load() function!!!

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
BondFactory, Atom, Bond

Method Detail

bondType

public static ChemicalComponentBonds.BondOrder bondType(Atom atom0,
                                                        Atom atom1)
Try to determine what type of bond might exist between the two atoms using a dictionary of known chemical compounds. See BOND_TYPE_* fields for possible return values.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if either atom argument is null.

bondType

public static ChemicalComponentBonds.BondOrder bondType(Bond bond)
Try to determine what type of bond might exist between the two atoms in the given Bond using a dictionary of know chemical compounds. See BOND_TYPE_* fields for possible return values.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the bond argument is null.

knownCompound

public static boolean knownCompound(java.lang.String compoundCode)
Determine if the given compound code is contained in the dictionary and return true if it is or false if it is not.
